name: @gp-australia-pacific/gpap-frontend-functions
description: Supporting frontend library functions for GPAP web infra.

scripts.build:js: npx bili --format cjs --format esm --format umd --format iife --module-name donations src/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.docs:serve: echo open http://localhost:4001 in just a moment… && documentation serve src/index.js --watch --config documentation.yml
scripts.docs:build: documentation build src/index.js -f html -o docs --config documentation.yml

author: Peter Weltë
